attributes.action: force councils to sort out britains roads instead of just patching up the holes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for too long now we have been driving around on sub standard roads. Its about time the government made councils resurface the roads properly. A survey by Kwik Fit (that replaces a lot of the damage) has concluded that 1.1 million motorists damage tyres and wheels after hitting potholes each year.

It was already known that councils spend £60,000,000 a year compensating motorists for pothole damage, yet only £35,000,000 repairing potholes. why not just use this money properly and reapir the roads.

i live in sheffield and have recently found out i have a buckled wheel. Most likely cause......potholes in the road. i now have to spend my hard earned getting it repaired. i'm sick of it.  please join this protest and pass on to EVERYONE you know.
